EmailTemplate.subject: See Why Thousands Have Extended Their Aircraft Warranty with MSP!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Honeywell's signature Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) is like an extended warranty available on a home, car or major appliance, but for your aircraft. Business aircraft operators simply choose the coverage that best meets their needs, pay an annual usage-based fee, and stop worrying about the devastating impact of an unplanned equipment failure on their operations and maintenance budget.
Don't believe in extended warranties?
While it's true that some operators prefer a "pay as you go" approach to aircraft maintenance, this is unreliable and can quickly become unmanageable. Unexpected failures happen and when they do the cost of parts and labor can mount up quickly. We've seen customers spend as much as six figures replacing a component when they could have covered the cost of the cockpit or whole system at a fraction of the cost of the repair!
Control your costs and keep your plane flying! Contact Spirit Aeronautics today to learn more about Honeywell MSP or request a customized quote based on your needs.
